SEARCH
Package Network.ClientSide

Class RemoteClientImplementation

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Network.ClientSide.Client
Network.ClientSide.RemoteClientImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, RemoteClientInterface, GameModelObserver, LivingRoomObserver, PersonalGoalObserver, PlayerObserver, ShelfObserver, ViewObserver
public class RemoteClientImplementation extends Client implements RemoteClientInterface, ViewObserver, LivingRoomObserver, ShelfObserver, PlayerObserver, GameModelObserver, PersonalGoalObserver
This Class is the actual Client with all its necessary features fully implemented. Some methods in it are sent to the RemoteServer through the RemoteClientInterface, while others are meant to enable the communication between a RemoteClient and the View linked to it.
See Also:

      Parameters:

      port - th port of the RemoteServer
      userInterface - the View of the user
      Throws:
      RemoteException - an Exception that notifies an error in the connection * with the RemoteServer
